arts.ttl: Florian Wirtz’s free-kick clinches victory for Germany against Northern Ireland
arts.sum: A stunning strike from Isaac Price was not enough for Northern Ireland as second-half goals earned Germany a 3-1 World Cup qualifying win to ease the pressure on Julian Nagelsmann. Price’s 34th-minute volley cancelled out an early goal from Serge Gnabry and gave Northern Ireland genuine hope of getting something out of the game, but quick-fire goals from the substitute Nadiem Amiri and Liverpool’s £116m man Florian Wirtz settled it midway through the second half. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Michael O’Neill rues mistakes in Northern Ireland’s defence after Germany defeat
arts.sum: A superb strike from Isaac Price cancelled out Serge Gnabry’s early goal for Germany.

arts.ttl: Northern Ireland beaten by quick-fire double in Germany
arts.sum: Isaac Price drew Northern Ireland level in the first half but goals from Nadiem Amiri and Florian Wirtz settled it for Germany after the break.

arts.ttl: Germany bounce back with 3-1 victory over Northern Ireland
arts.sum: Germany found much-needed relief on Sunday night as they defeated Northern Ireland 3–1 at the Rhein-Energie-Stadion, ending a damaging three-match losing streak in World Cup qualifying.

arts.ttl: Germany v Northern Ireland | Michael O’Neill’s side look to stun giants in World Cup qualifier
arts.sum: After opening their World Cup qualifying campaign with victory over Luxembourg, can Northern Ireland make it a trip to remember with a win against giants Germany at the RheinEnergieStadion in Cologne?

arts.ttl: Confirmed lineups: Germany vs. Northern Ireland
arts.sum: Germany aim to exorcise recent demons—reeling from a rare away loss to Slovakia and a trio of consecutive defeats, as they welcome Northern Ireland to Cologne’s Rhein-Energie-Stadion. Who will come out on top? Here are the confirmed lineups for both teams.
